abstract: In the highly volatile world of options trading, minutes count. And it was one particular minute on Wednesday morning — one second, actually — that caught the eye of Jon Najarian, the co-founder of OptionMonster.com.
lead_paragraph: In the highly volatile world of options trading, minutes count. And it was one particular minute on Wednesday morning — one second, actually — that caught the eye of Jon Najarian, the co-founder of OptionMonster.com.

headline.main: Symptoms of a Tip-Off in UnitedHealth Trades?
